title: UTAR STUDENT'S ONLINE SURVEY (May 2018 Trimester)
description:
Kindly complete the evaluation survey within the survey duration as stated below.             Your answers and comments will be kept strictly confidential. Your feedback will be useful to the lecturers in future trimesters and to help us improve our services. 

Survey Period: 
16 July 2018 (Monday) to 19 August 2018 (Sunday)
